body:
Comment 4 by **cserveny.tamas**: 
Hello,

Linux mahe 3.13.0-24-generic #47-Ubuntu SMP Fri May 2 23:30:00 UTC 2014 x86_64 x86_64
x86_64 GNU/Linux

Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
Python 2.7.6
GNU gdb (Ubuntu 7.7-0ubuntu3) 7.7
GO 1.3

go build -gcflags "-N -l" webadmin
